prism2rids.h

00001 
00002 // The contents of this file are believed to come from a linux PRISM2 driver,
00003 // with some changes made by Pascal Stang.
00004 
00005 /*--- Record ID Constants --------------------------*/
00006 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------
00007 Configuration RIDs: Network Parameters, Static Configuration Entities
00008 --------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00009 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFPORTTYPE              ((UINT16)0xFC00)
00010 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFOWNMACADDR            ((UINT16)0xFC01)
00011 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFDESIREDSSID           ((UINT16)0xFC02)
00012 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFOWNCHANNEL            ((UINT16)0xFC03)
00013 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFOWNSSID               ((UINT16)0xFC04)
00014 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFOWNATIMWIN            ((UINT16)0xFC05)
00015 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFSYSSCALE              ((UINT16)0xFC06)

00017 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFWDSADDR               ((UINT16)0xFC08)
00018 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFPMENABLED             ((UINT16)0xFC09)
00019 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFPMEPS                 ((UINT16)0xFC0A)
00020 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFMULTICASTRX           ((UINT16)0xFC0B)
00021 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFMAXSLEEPDUR           ((UINT16)0xFC0C)
00022 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFPMHOLDDUR             ((UINT16)0xFC0D)
00023 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFOWNNAME               ((UINT16)0xFC0E)
00024 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFOWNDTIMPER            ((UINT16)0xFC10)
00025 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFWDSADDR1              ((UINT16)0xFC11)
00026 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFWDSADDR2              ((UINT16)0xFC12)
00027 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFWDSADDR3              ((UINT16)0xFC13)
00028 #define PRISM2_RID_CNFWDSADDR4              ((UINT16)0xFC14)
